entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio insists on autocorrecting the method name I type to a similarly named field #74482
  • Renaming a global using alias does not update usages #74474
    Backlog

Closed

  • Cannot create nuint to UInt32 conversion in custom CoreLib #66442
  • When does AttributeData.AttributeClass return null? #65355
  • Tests failing with BadImageFormatException #74396
  • Erroneous CS0266 on 'byte = byte & byte' #74375
  • Ref escape analysis errors are not reported for compound assignment #63852
    17.12

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix nested nullability of collection expressions in public APIs #74490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update SystemTextJsonVersion to 8.0.4 #74489
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adds support for metadata LSP language features in VSCode #74488
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Don't check constraints on methods which are not substituted #74487
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Include PrepareResources before ExtensionJsonOutputGroup #74486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add option for LSP based auto-insert #74485
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not parse methods with accessibility modifiers as local functions #74484
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove C++ sources from repo #74481
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Sem search signature #74480
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move to new version of MS.DevDiv.Optimization.Data.Powershell #74483
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • 17.10 : Also checking line end when block structure is filtered #74477
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • 17.11 : Also checking line end when block structure is filtered #74479
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify access to options across code style, code style fixes and feature layers #74450
    Next
  • Add additional incremental generator test #74476
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Editor color scheme is visible but disabled when unsupported theme is selected #74236
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove Overload Resolution Priority from working set #74382
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Tests to verify ref safety bug fix #74341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Move suppressions to code instead of .gdnsuppress #74467
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74469
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix issue with ForAttributeWithMetadataName being in an inconsistent state after a match. #74468
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.11 to main #74491
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Flesh out capturing of `this` into a closure in an instance extension member. #74463
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Extension type erasure #74313
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged
  • Address issues with VSIX item publishing projects and FUTDC #74470
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add IsEnabled property to IEditorInlineRenameService #74361
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • WithDocumentAttributes #74421
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not load generators in VS process #74444
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Implement remaining span conversions #74420
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Fix interceptors bugs involving ref this parameters #74363
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Support VS System theme #74432
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Increase driver cache size #74431
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • With project info #74289
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Unify code paths that update ordinary/additional/analyzerconfig documents #74441
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Put TArg before callbacks #74370
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Instance extensions - flesh out code gen for iterator/async methods. #74437
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Flesh out delegate creation from instance extensions #74459
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix UnscopedRef handling in indexers #74343
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid span conversion in delegate extension receiver #74044
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
